Play a game of Rock Paper Scissors against someone.

## Usage

```sh
;rockpaperscissors <user>
```

## Examples

```sh
# play rock paper scissors against @ToastedToast
;rockpaperscissors @ToastedToast
```

## Aliases

- rps
